item.description:
Saludos desde Jamaica Plain,

Planning another event for Brunch in JP on July 23th at 10:45am.  This time at Canary Square.

This event is for all speakers.

Can be accessed by Green Line (Heath St and 10 minute walk), or by #41, or #39 buses. 

Want to limit to 10 people.

 

Hope to see you for Cafe and Brunch.

 

Ernesto
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group talking Spanish around the left side of the restaurant

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch in Jamaica Plain (Canary Square).
